description.english: Did 3 mischievous things with Jodie and Aiden.
description.german: Mit Jodie und Aiden 3 Mal etwas Gemeines getan.
description.french: Accomplir trois bêtises avec Jodie et Aiden.
description.italian: Hai compiuto 3 cattive azioni con Jodie e Aiden.
description.koreana: 조디와 에이든으로 세 가지 말썽을 일으키십시오.
description.spanish: Has hecho 3 travesuras con Jodie y Aiden.
description.schinese: 使用朱迪和艾登进行了 3 次恶作剧。
description.tchinese: 和祖迪及艾登做三件惡作劇。
description.russian: Совершить три шалости с Джоди и Айденом.
description.japanese: ジョディとエイデンで3回いたずらをする
description.portuguese: Fizeste três coisas más com a Jodie e o Aiden.
description.polish: Wyrządź 3 psoty Aidenem i Jodie.
description.danish: Gjorde tre drilagtige ting med Jodie og Aiden.
description.dutch: Je hebt 3 ondeugende dingen gedaan met Jodie en Aiden.
description.finnish: Teki 3 pahanilkistä juttua Jodiella ja Aidenilla.
description.norwegian: Utførte tre fantestreker med Jodie og Aiden.
description.swedish: Gjorde tre olydiga saker med Jodie och Aiden.
description.turkish: Jodie ve Aiden ile 3 muzip şey yapıldı.
description.brazilian: Fez 3 travessuras com Jodie e Aiden.
description.latam: Has hecho 3 travesuras con Jodie y Aiden.

description.english: Vanquished the entities with Aiden.
description.german: Mit Aiden die Existenzen bezwungen.
description.french: Vaincre les entités avec Aiden.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto le entità con Aiden.
description.spanish: Has vencido a las entidades con Aiden.
description.schinese: 用艾登降服了灵体。
description.tchinese: 使用艾登戰勝靈體。
description.russian: Одолеть всех существ с помощью Айдена.
description.japanese: エイデンを使って霊体を撃退する
description.portuguese: Usaste o Aiden para te livrares das entidades.
description.polish: Pokonaj istoty Aidenem.
description.danish: Besejrede væsnerne med Aiden.
description.dutch: Je hebt de entiteiten vernietigd met Aiden.
description.norwegian: Tilintetgjorde entitetene med Aiden.
description.brazilian: Derrotou as entidades com Aiden.
description.latam: Has vencido a las entidades con Aiden.

description.english: Forgave Jodie's father.
description.german: Jodies Vater vergeben.
description.french: Accorder son pardon au père de Jodie.
description.italian: Hai perdonato il padre di Jodie.
description.spanish: El padre de Jodie ha sido perdonado.

description.tchinese: 原諒祖迪的父親。

description.portuguese: Perdoaste o pai da Jodie.
description.polish: Wybacz ojcu Jodie.
description.danish: Tilgav Jodies far.
description.dutch: Je hebt Jodies vader vergeven.
description.norwegian: Tilga Jodies far.
description.brazilian: Perdoou o pai de Jodie.
description.latam: El padre de Jodie ha sido perdonado.

description.english: Choked Philip with Aiden.
description.german: Philip mit Aiden gewürgt.
description.french: Étrangler Philip avec Aiden.
description.italian: Hai soffocato Philip usando Aiden.
description.spanish: Has asfixiado a Philip con Aiden.
description.schinese: 使用艾登掐住了菲利普的脖子。
description.tchinese: 使用艾登讓菲利浦窒息
description.japanese: エイデンでフィリップを窒息させる
description.portuguese: Usaste o Aiden para estrangular o Phillip.
description.polish: Spraw, by Aiden przydusił Philipa.
description.danish: Kvalte Philip med Aiden.
description.dutch: Je hebt Philip gewurgd met Aiden.
description.norwegian: Kvelte Philip med Aiden.
description.brazilian: Estrangulou Philip com Aiden.
description.latam: Has asfixiado a Philip con Aiden.

description.english: Taught 3 or more of the teens a lesson, or started the house fire, with Aiden.
description.german: Mit Aiden 3 oder mehr der Teenies eine Lektion erteilt oder den Hausbrand entfacht.
description.french: Avec Aiden, donner une leçon à trois adolescents ou plus ou mettre le feu à la maison.
description.italian: Hai dato una lezione a 3 o più ragazzi o bruciato la casa con Aiden.
description.koreana: 에이든을 사용하여 세 명 이상의 청소년을 혼내거나 집에 불을 지르십시오.
description.spanish: Con Aiden, le has dado una lección a 3 o más adolescentes o has prendido fuego a la casa.
description.schinese: 使用艾登给 3 名或者更多的青少年教训，或者点燃了房子。
description.tchinese: 使用艾登教訓三個或以上青少年，或是讓房子失火。
description.russian: Проучить как минимум трех  подростков либо устроить в доме пожар с помощью Айдена.
description.japanese: 3人以上の子供にエイデンを使って復讐するか家に火をつける
description.portuguese: Com o Aiden, deste uma lição a três ou mais adolescentes, ou incendiaste a casa.
description.polish: Sterując Aidenem, daj nauczkę przynajmniej 3 uczestnikom przyjęcia lub wznieć pożar domu.
description.danish: Lærte tre teenagere eller mere en lektie med Aiden eller startede branden i huset.
description.dutch: Je hebt 3 of meer tieners een lesje geleerd, of je hebt het huis in brand gestoken met Aiden.
description.finnish: Antoi kolmelle tai useammalle teinille opetuksen Aidenin avulla tai sytytti talon tuleen.
description.norwegian: Lærte tre eller fler tenåringer om livets harde fakta eller startet husbrannen, med Aiden.
description.swedish: Lärde tre eller fler tonåringar en läxa eller startade en husbrand med Aiden.
description.turkish: Aiden ile 3 ya da daha fazla gence bir ders verildi ya da ev ateşe verildi.
description.brazilian: Deu uma lição em 3 ou mais adolescentes ou colocou fogo na casa com Aiden.
description.latam: Con Aiden, le has dado una lección a 3 o más adolescentes o has prendido fuego a la casa.

description.english: Did not impress or scare the teens with Aiden.
description.german: Teenager nicht mit Aiden eingeschüchtert oder verängstigt.
description.french: Ne pas impressionner ni effrayer les adolescents avec Aiden.
description.italian: Non hai impressionato o spaventato i ragazzi con Aiden.
description.spanish: No has impresionado ni asustado a los adolescentes con Aiden.
description.schinese: 没有用艾登吓唬青少年或者给他们教训。
description.tchinese: 不用艾登驚嚇青少年們
description.russian: Не пугать подростков с помощью Айдена.
description.japanese: エイデンを使って子どもたちを怖がらせずにシーンを終える
description.portuguese: Não impressionaste nem assustaste os adolescentes com o Aiden.
description.polish: Odmów użycia Aidena, by zaimponować uczestnikom przyjęcia lub przestraszyć ich.
description.danish: Imponerede eller skræmte ikke teenagerne med Aiden.
description.dutch: Je hebt de tieners niet geïmponeerd of bang gemaakt met Aiden.
description.finnish: Ei tehnyt vaikutusta tai pelotellut teinejä Aidenin avulla.
description.norwegian: Gjorde ikke inntrykk på eller skremte tenåringene med Aiden.
description.swedish: Lät bli att skrämma eller imponera på tonåringarna med Aiden.
description.turkish: Gençler, Aiden ile korkutulmadı ya da etkilenmedi.
description.brazilian: Não impressionou nem assustou os adolescentes com Aiden.
description.latam: No has impresionado ni asustado a los adolescentes con Aiden.

description.english: Protected Jodie from her attackers.
description.german: Jodie vor ihren Angreifern geschützt.
description.french: Défendre Jodie contre ses assaillants.
description.italian: Hai protetto Jodie dagli aggressori.
description.spanish: Has protegido a Jodie de sus atacantes.
description.schinese: 保护朱迪免受攻击。
description.tchinese: 從侵犯者手中保護祖迪
description.japanese: 襲われているジョディを守る
description.portuguese: Protegeste a Jodie dos atacantes.
description.polish: Ochroń Jodie przed napastnikami.
description.danish: Beskyttede Jodie mod hendes overfaldsmænd.
description.dutch: Je hebt Jodie beschermd tegen haar aanvallers.
description.norwegian: Beskyttet Jodie fra angriperne.
description.brazilian: Protegeu Jodie contra os agressores.
description.latam: Has protegido a Jodie de sus atacantes.

description.english: Successfully shut down the condenser portal.
description.german: Das Kondensator-Portal erfolgreich geschlossen.
description.french: Refermer le portail du condenseur.
description.italian: Hai chiuso il portale del condensatore.
description.spanish: Has logrado cerrar el portal del condensador.
description.schinese: 成功地关闭了聚魂器通道。
description.tchinese: 成功關閉聚魂器中樞
description.japanese: コンデンサーをシャットダウンする

description.polish: Dezaktywuj portal w kondensatorze.
description.danish: Lukkede for kondensatorportalen.
description.dutch: Je hebt het condensatorportaal succesvol gesloten.
description.norwegian: Vellykket avkobling av kondensatorportalen.

displayName.japanese: チャネリングマスター

description.english: Channeled all dead bodies in the condenser compound.
description.german: Channeling mit allen Toten im Kondensator-Komplex.
description.french: Canaliser tous les cadavres du complexe.
description.italian: Hai comunicato con tutti i cadaveri della zona del condensatore.
description.spanish: Has canalizado todos los cadáveres en el complejo del condensador.
description.schinese: 与聚魂器混合体中的所有死尸通灵。
description.tchinese: 在聚魂器與所有死者通靈
description.russian: Снять астральный отпечаток со всех мертвых тел в научном центре.
description.japanese: コンデンサー施設のすべての死体にチャネリングする
description.portuguese: Canalizaste todas as memórias dos corpos que estavam no complexo do condensador.
description.polish: Aktywuj wspomnienia wszystkich zmarłych w kompleksie badawczym.
description.danish: Kanaliserede alle lig i kondensatoranlægget.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle herinneringen van de lijken bij de condensator gezien.
description.norwegian: Kanaliserte likene til oppsamlingsfeltet til kondensatoren.
description.swedish: Kanaliserade alla döda kroppar i kondensatoranläggningen.
description.turkish: Kondensör tesisindeki tüm cesetlere ruhsal görü yapıldı.
description.brazilian: Canalizou todos os cadáveres no complexo do condensador.
description.latam: Has canalizado todos los cadáveres en el complejo del condensador.

displayName.japanese: パーフェクトソルジャー

description.english: Completed most of the physical training successfully.
description.german: Großteil des körperlichen Trainings erfolgreich abgeschlossen.
description.french: Accomplir avec succès la majeure partie de l'entraînement physique.
description.italian: Hai superato la maggior parte delle prove fisiche.
description.spanish: Has superado la mayoría de la preparación física.
description.schinese: 成功地完成了大部分的体能训练。
description.tchinese: 完成大部分體能訓練。
description.russian: Успешно завершить большинство испытаний на физическую подготовку.
description.japanese: ほとんどの身体訓練を成功させる
description.portuguese: Cumpriste a maior parte dos treinos físicos com sucesso.
description.polish: Ukończ większość elementów szkolenia fizycznego, nie popełniając błędu.
description.danish: Gennemførte det meste af den fysiske træning.
description.dutch: Je hebt de meeste lichamelijke trainingen succesvol doorstaan.
description.norwegian: Gjennomførte mesteparten av den fysiske treningen.
description.brazilian: Concluiu a maior parte do treinamento físico.
description.latam: Has superado la mayoría de la preparación física.

description.english: Won every fight whilst taking less than 5 hits.
description.german: Jeden Kampf gewonnen und dabei  weniger als 5 Treffer erlitten.
description.french: Triompher de chaque combat en encaissant moins de 5 coups.
description.italian: Hai superato tutti i combattimenti subendo meno di 5 colpi.
description.spanish: Has ganado todas las peleas y recibido menos de 5 golpes.
description.schinese: 在每次战斗中在被击中少于 5 次的情况下获胜。
description.tchinese: 在被打到少於5次下完成所有格鬥。
description.russian: Победить во всех спаррингах, пропустив менее пяти ударов.
description.japanese: ５回以上攻撃をくらわずに格闘訓練を終える
description.portuguese: Ganhaste todos os combates sofrendo menos de cinco golpes.
description.polish: Wygraj wszystkie walki, otrzymując mniej niż 5 ciosów.
description.danish: Vandt alle kampe og blev ramt mindre end fem gange.
description.dutch: Je hebt elk gevecht gewonnen en bent minder dan 5 keer geraakt.
description.finnish: Voitti kaikki taistelut ottaen alle 5 osumaa.
description.norwegian: Vant alle kampene og ble truffet av færre enn 5 slag.
description.swedish: Vann alla strider utan att bli träffad mer än 4 gånger.
description.turkish: 5'ten az darbe alınarak tüm dövüşler kazanıldı.
description.brazilian: Ganhou todas as lutas e levou menos de 5 golpes.
description.latam: Has ganado todas las peleas y recibido menos de 5 golpes.

description.english: Completed all stealth training without being spotted.
description.german: Jedes Tarntraining abgeschlossen, ohne entdeckt zu werden.
description.french: Réussir toutes les épreuves de furtivité sans se faire repérer.
description.italian: Hai superato tutte le prove di furtività senza farti individuare.
description.koreana: 단 한 번도 적발되지 않고 은신 훈련을 통과하십시오.
description.spanish: Has completado todos los entrenamientos de sigilo sin que te vean.
description.schinese: 完成所有的潜匿训练而不被发现。
description.tchinese: 在沒有被發現的情況下完成所有潛行訓練。
description.russian: Пройти все испытания на скрытность, ни разу не дав обнаружить себя.
description.japanese: 一度も見つからずにステルス訓練を終える
description.portuguese: Cumpriste todos os treinos de furtividade sem te detetarem.
description.polish: Ukończ szkolenie w skradaniu się i nie daj się zauważyć.
description.danish: Klarede al sløringstræning uden at blive opdaget.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle sluiptrainingen voltooid zonder gezien te worden.
description.norwegian: Fullførte alle snikoppdrag uten å bli oppdaget.
description.swedish: Slutförde all smygträning utan att bli upptäckt.
description.turkish: Tüm gizlilik eğitimleri fark edilmeden tamamlandı.
description.brazilian: Concluiu todos os treinamentos de furtividade sem ser visto.
description.latam: Has completado todos los entrenamientos de sigilo sin que te vean.

description.english: Shut down the monitor and finished the mission using only Aiden.
description.german: Den Monitor abgeschaltet und die Mission nur mit Aiden beendet.
description.french: Éteindre l'écran et terminer la mission en n'utilisant qu'Aiden.
description.italian: Hai spento il monitor e completato la missione usando solo Aiden.
description.koreana: 오직 에이든을 사용하여 모니터를 멈추고 임무를 완수하십시오.
description.spanish: Trabajo limpio
description.schinese: 仅使用艾登关闭了监视器并完成了任务。
description.tchinese: 只使用艾登關閉監視器螢幕及完成任務
description.russian: Отключить монитор и выполнить задание, используя только Айдена.
description.japanese: エイデンの力のみでモニターをシャットダウンしてミッションを終える
description.portuguese: Desligaste o monitor e terminaste a missão usando apenas o Aiden.
description.polish: Wyłącz monitor i ukończ misję jedynie przy użyciu Aidena.
description.danish: Slukkede for monitoren og afsluttede missionen kun med Aiden.
description.dutch: Je hebt de monitor uitgeschakeld en de missie voltooid door alleen Aiden te gebruiken.
description.finnish: Sulki monitorin ja suoritti tehtävän käyttäen vain Aidenia.
description.norwegian: Skrudde av monitoren og fullførte oppdraget med kun Aiden.
description.swedish: Stängde ned monitorn och avslutade uppdraget med bara Aiden.
description.turkish: Ekran kapatıldı ve sadece Aiden kullanılarak görev tamamlandı.
description.brazilian: Desligou o monitor e concluiu a missão usando somente o Aiden.
description.latam: Has apagado el monitor y terminado la misión usando solo a Aiden.

description.english: Finished the mission using only the Sheik.
description.german: Die Mission nur mit dem Scheich bestanden.
description.french: Terminer la mission en n'utilisant que le cheik.
description.italian: Hai completato la missione usando solo lo sceicco.
description.spanish: Has terminado la misión usando solo al jeque Ahmad.
description.schinese: 仅使用谢赫完成了任务。
description.tchinese: 只使用謝赫就完成任務
description.japanese: 大使のみ使って任務を遂行する
description.portuguese: Cumpriste a missão usando apenas o Xeque.
description.polish: Wykonaj misję jedynie przy użyciu szejka.
description.danish: Afsluttede missionen kun med sheiken.
description.dutch: Je hebt de missie voltooid met alleen de sjeik.
description.norwegian: Fullførte oppdraget med bruk av kun sheiken.
description.swedish: Avslutade uppdraget genom att bara använda shejken.
description.brazilian: Concluiu a missão usando somente o Xeique.
description.latam: Has terminado la misión usando solo al jeque Ahmad.

description.english: Cooked a meal, cleaned the apartment, took a shower, wore the elegant dress and put on some music.
description.german: Essen gekocht, die Wohnung aufgeräumt, geduscht, das elegante Kleid angezogen und Musik aufgelegt.
description.french: Préparer à dîner, faire le ménage, prendre une douche, porter une robe élégante et mettre de la musique.
description.italian: Hai cucinato, pulito l'appartamento, fatto una doccia, indossato l'abito da sera e messo un po' di musica.
description.koreana: 식사를 요리하고, 아파트를 청소하고, 샤워를 하고, 아름다운 드레스를 입고, 음악을 켜십시오.
description.spanish: Has hecho una comida, has limpiado el apartamento, te has dado una ducha, te has puesto el vestido elegante y has puesto música.
description.schinese: 做了饭，打扫了房间，洗了澡，穿了优雅的衣服，并放了一些音乐。
description.tchinese: 煮菜、打掃公寓房間、淋浴、穿著優雅的洋裝並放點音樂。
description.russian: Приготовить ужин, убраться в квартире, принять душ, надеть элегантное платье и включить музыку.
description.japanese: 食事を作り アパートを掃除し シャワーを浴び エレガントなドレスを着て 音楽をかける
description.portuguese: Cozinhaste uma refeição, limpaste o apartamento, tomaste um duche, vestiste o vestido elegante e puseste música a tocar.
description.polish: Przygotuj posiłek, posprzątaj mieszkanie, weź prysznic, ubierz elegancką sukienkę i włącz muzykę.
description.danish: Tilberedte et måltid, gjorde rent i lejligheden, tog et bad, tog den elegante kjole på og satte musik på.
description.dutch: Je hebt eten gekookt, het appartement schoongemaakt, gedoucht, de elegante jurk gedragen en muziek opgezet.
description.finnish: Kokkasi aterian, siivosi asunnon, kävi suihkussa, pukeutui tyylikkääseen mekkoon ja laittoi musiikin soimaan.
description.norwegian: Laget mat, vasket leiligheten, tok en dusj, tok på den elegante kjolen og satte på litt musikk.
description.swedish: Lagade mat, städade, duschade, bar den eleganta klänningen och satte på musik.
description.turkish: Bir yemek yapıldı, daire temizlendi, bir duş alındı, şık giyinildi ve müzik seçildi.
description.brazilian: Preparou uma refeição, limpou o apartamento, tomou banho, colocou o vestido elegante e ligou a música.
description.latam: Has hecho una comida, has limpiado el apartamento, te has dado una ducha, te has puesto el vestido elegante y has puesto música.

description.english: Ordered a pizza, watched some TV and wore something casual.
description.german: Pizza bestellt, Fernsehen geschaut und etwas Bequemes angezogen.
description.french: Commander une pizza, regarder la télé et porter des vêtements simples.
description.italian: Hai ordinato una pizza, guardato la TV e indossato abiti casual.
description.koreana: 피자를 주문하고, TV를 시청하고, 수수한 옷을 입으십시오.
description.spanish: Has pedido pizza, has visto la televisión y te has puesto algo casual.
description.schinese: 点了份披萨，看了会儿电视，并穿了休闲的衣服。
description.tchinese: 訂披薩、看電視、穿著簡便。
description.russian: Заказать пиццу, посмотреть телевизор, надеть повседневную одежду.
description.japanese: ピザを注文し、TVを見てカジュアルな服を着る
description.portuguese: Mandaste vir uma piza, viste televisão e vestiste roupa informal.
description.polish: Zamów pizzę, pooglądaj telewizję i ubierz się swobodnie.
description.danish: Bestilte pizza, så noget fjernsyn og havde afslappet tøj på.
description.dutch: Je hebt een pizza besteld, tv gekeken en droeg iets makkelijks.
description.finnish: Tilasi pitsaa, katsoi televisiota ja pukeutui rennosti.
description.norwegian: Bestilte pizza, så på TV, og hadde på hverdagslige klær.
description.swedish: Beställde pizza, tittade på tv och bar vardagskläder.
description.turkish: Bir pizza söylendi, televizyon izlendi ve sıradan bir şeyler giyildi.
description.brazilian: Pediu uma pizza, assistiu à televisão e vestiu uma roupa casual.
description.latam: Has pedido pizza, has visto la televisión y te has puesto algo casual.

description.english: Slept with Ryan.
description.german: Mit Ryan geschlafen.
description.french: Coucher avec Ryan.
description.italian: Sei stata a letto con Ryan.
description.spanish: Te has acostado con Ryan.
description.schinese: 与雷恩上了床。
description.tchinese: 和雷恩發生親密關係。
description.japanese: ライアンと愛を交わす
description.portuguese: Dormiste com o Ryan.
description.polish: Pójdź do łóżka z Ryanem.
description.danish: Gik i seng med Ryan.
description.dutch: Je bent met Ryan naar bed gegaan.
description.norwegian: Lå med Ryan.
description.brazilian: Dormiu com Ryan.
description.latam: Te has acostado con Ryan.

description.english: Made it to the cathedral without being spotted.
description.german: Unentdeckt bis zur Kathedrale gelangt.
description.french: Atteindre la cathédrale sans se faire repérer.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto la cattedrale senza farti vedere.
description.spanish: Has llegado a la catedral sin que te vean.
description.schinese: 成功抵达教堂而不被发现。
description.tchinese: 在不被發現的情況下到達大教堂
description.russian: Добраться до собора, не дав себя обнаружить.
description.japanese: 見つからずに教会にたどり着く
description.portuguese: Chegaste à catedral sem ser detetada.
description.polish: Dostań się do katedry niezauważenie.
description.danish: Nåede frem til katedralen uden at blive opdaget.
description.dutch: Je bent ongezien in de kathedraal beland.
description.norwegian: Kom fram til katedralen uten å bli oppdaget.
description.swedish: Tog dig till katedralen utan att bli upptäckt.
description.brazilian: Chegou até à catedral sem ser vista.
description.latam: Has llegado a la catedral sin que te vean.

description.english: Escaped the train without being arrested.
description.german: Aus dem Zug geflohen, ohne festgenommen zu werden.
description.french: S'enfuir du train sans se faire arrêter.
description.italian: Sei fuggita dal treno senza farti arrestare.
description.spanish: Has escapado del tren sin que te arresten.
description.schinese: 在没有被逮捕的情况下逃离了火车。
description.tchinese: 在不被拘捕的情況下從列車脫逃。
description.japanese: 捕まらずに電車から逃走する
description.portuguese: Fugiste do comboio sem ser presa.
description.polish: Uniknij aresztowania i ucieknij z pociągu.
description.danish: Flygtede fra toget uden at blive arresteret.
description.dutch: Je bent uit de trein ontsnapt zonder gearresteerd te worden.
description.norwegian: Unnslapp toget uten å bli arrestert.
description.swedish: Flydde från tåget utan att bli arresterad.
description.brazilian: Fugiu do trem sem ser presa.
description.latam: Has escapado del tren sin que te arresten.

description.english: Destroyed the gas station, the church, the gun store and the helicopter.
description.german: Die Tankstelle, die Kirche, das Waffengeschäft und den Helikopter zerstört.
description.french: Détruire la station-service, l'église, l'armurerie et l'hélicoptère.
description.italian: Hai distrutto la pompa di benzina, la chiesa, l'armeria e l'elicottero.
description.koreana: 주유소, 교회, 총기상, 그리고 헬리콥터를 파괴하십시오.
description.spanish: Has destruido la gasolinera, la iglesia, la tienda de armas y el helicóptero.
description.schinese: 摧毁了加油站、教堂、枪支商店和直升机。
description.tchinese: 摧毀加油站、教堂、槍枝專賣店和直昇機。
description.russian: Взорвать бензозаправку, церковь, оружейный магазин и вертолет.
description.japanese: ガススタンド、教会、銃の販売店、ヘリコプターを破壊する
description.portuguese: Destruíste a bomba de gasolina, a igreja, a loja de armas e o helicóptero.
description.polish: Zniszcz stację benzynową, kościół, sklep z bronią i śmigłowiec.
description.danish: Ødelagde tankstationen, kirken, våbenbutikken og helikopteren.
description.dutch: Je hebt het tankstation, de kerk, de wapenwinkel en de helikopter vernietigd.
description.finnish: Tuhosi huoltoaseman, kirkon, asekaupan ja helikopterin.
description.norwegian: Ødela bensinstasjonen, kirken, våpenbutikken og helikopteret.
description.swedish: Förstörde bensinstationen, kyrkan, vapenaffären och helikoptern.
description.turkish: Benzin istasyonu, kilise, silah dükkanı ve helikopter yok edildi.
description.brazilian: Destruiu o posto de gasolina, a igreja, a loja de armas e o helicóptero.
description.latam: Has destruido la gasolinera, la iglesia, la tienda de armas y el helicóptero.

description.english: Got arrested three times and escaped each time.
description.german: Drei mal verhaftet worden und jedes Mal entkommen.
description.french: Se faire arrêter, puis s'enfuir à trois reprises.
description.italian: Sei stata arrestata tre volte e sei sempre riuscita a fuggire.
description.koreana: 세 번 체포되고 세 번 모두 탈출하십시오.
description.spanish: Te han arrestado tres veces y has escapado las tres.
description.schinese: 被逮捕了三次，并且每次都成功逃脱。
description.tchinese: 被拘捕三次每次都順利脫逃。
description.japanese: 3回捕まり3回とも逃走する
description.portuguese: Foste presa três vezes e conseguiste fugir sempre.
description.polish: Daj się aresztować trzykrotnie i za każdym razem ucieknij.
description.danish: Blev arresteret tre gange og slap væk alle gange.
description.dutch: Je bent drie keer gearresteerd en bent alle keren ontsnapt.
description.finnish: Joutui pidätetyksi kolme kertaa ja pakeni joka kerralla.
description.norwegian: Ble arrestert tre ganger og rømte alle gangene.
description.swedish: Arresterades tre gånger och flydde alla tre gångerna.
description.turkish: Üç kere tutuklanıldı ve her seferinde kaçıldı.
description.brazilian: Foi presa três vezes e fugiu todas as vezes.
description.latam: Te han arrestado tres veces y has escapado las tres.

description.english: Earned enough money to have some chocolate during dinner.
description.german: Genug Geld verdient, um zum Abendbrot Schokolade zu essen.
description.french: Gagner suffisamment d'argent pour manger du chocolat au dîner.
description.italian: Hai racimolato soldi a sufficienza per comprare del cioccolato per cena.
description.koreana: 저녁 식사 때 초콜릿을 먹을 수 있게 충분한 돈을 모으십시오.
description.spanish: Has ganado suficiente dinero para comer chocolate en la cena.
description.schinese: 赚了足够的钱，可以在晚餐时吃一些巧克力。
description.tchinese: 賺到足夠的錢能在晚餐時吃巧克力。
description.russian: Заработать достаточно денег, чтобы купить к ужину шоколад.
description.japanese: 夕食用のチョコレートを買えるだけのお金を稼ぐ
description.portuguese: Ganhaste dinheiro suficiente para comer um chocolate ao jantar.
description.polish: Zarób dostatecznie dużo pieniędzy, aby móc zjeść czekoladę do kolacji.
description.danish: Tjente penge nok til at få noget chokolade til aftensmaden.
description.dutch: Je hebt genoeg geld verdiend voor wat chocola bij het avondeten.
description.finnish: Ansaitsi riittävästi rahaa, että sillä sai suklaata illallisen kanssa.
description.norwegian: Tjente nok penger til å unne seg litt sjokolade til middagen.
description.swedish: Tjänade nog med pengar för att äta lite choklad till middagen.
description.turkish: Akşam yemeğine biraz çikolata alacak kadar para kazanıldı.
description.brazilian: Ganhou dinheiro suficiente para comer chocolate no jantar.
description.latam: Has ganado suficiente dinero para comer chocolate en la cena.

description.english: Deactivated the supermarket's camera.
description.german: Die Kamera des Supermarkts deaktiviert.
description.french: Désactiver la caméra du supermarché.
description.italian: Hai disattivato la telecamera del supermercato.
description.spanish: Has desactivado la cámara del supermercado.
description.schinese: 关闭了超市的摄像头。
description.tchinese: 讓超市的警鈴失效。
description.japanese: スーパーの警報器をオフにする
description.portuguese: Desativaste a câmara do supermercado.
description.polish: Wyłącz kamerę w supermarkecie.
description.danish: Deaktiverede supermarkedets kamera.
description.dutch: Je hebt de camera van de supermarkt uitgeschakeld.
description.norwegian: Deaktiverte kameraet på supermarkedet.
description.brazilian: Desativou a câmera do supermercado.
description.latam: Has desactivado la cámara del supermercado.

description.english: Looked after Tuesday's baby, healed Jimmy and channeled Stan.
description.german: Tuesdays Baby untersucht, Jimmy geheilt und Channeling mit Stan.
description.french: Veiller sur le bébé de Tuesday, soigner Jimmy et canaliser Stan.
description.italian: Hai controllato la bambina di Tuesday, hai curato Jimmy e hai fatto comunicare Stan con sua moglie.
description.koreana: 튜즈데이의 아기를 돌보고, 지미를 치유하고, 스탠과 접혼하십시오.
description.spanish: Has sentido al bebé de Martes, has curado a Jimmy y has canalizado a Stan.
description.schinese: 照顾了星期二的孩子，治疗了吉米，并为斯坦做了通灵。
description.tchinese: 檢查星期二的嬰兒、治療吉米和幫史坦通靈。
description.russian: Проверить состояние ребенка Субботы, исцелить Джимми и снять астральный отпечаток со Стэна.
description.japanese: チューズデイの赤ん坊をチャネリング、ジミーを介抱し、スタンをチャネリングする
description.portuguese: Cuidaste do bebé da Tuesday, curaste o Jimmy e canalizaste o espírito da mulher do Stan.
description.polish: Zajmij się dzieckiem Środy, ulecz Jimmy'ego i pomóż Stanowi pogodzić się ze śmiercią żony.
description.danish: Undersøgte Tuesdays baby, helbredte Jimmy og kanaliserede Stan.
description.dutch: Je hebt Tuesdays baby onderzocht, Jimmy genezen en Stan geholpen.
description.finnish: Tarkisti Tuesdayn vauvan voinnin, paransi Jimmyn ja kanavoi Stanille.
description.norwegian: Passet på Tuesdays baby, leget Jimmy og kanaliserte Stan.
description.swedish: Tog hand om Tuesdays bebis, helade Jimmy och kanaliserade Stan.
description.turkish: Tuesday'in bebeği kontrol edildi, Jimmy iyileştirildi ve Stan'e ruhsal görü yapıldı.
description.brazilian: Verificou o bebê da Tuesday, curou o Jimmy e canalizou o Stan.
description.latam: Has sentido al bebé de Martes, has curado a Jimmy y has canalizado a Stan.

description.english: Successfully performed the entire ritual.
description.german: Das ganze Ritual bis zum Abschluss praktiziert.
description.french: Accomplir le rituel dans son intégralité.
description.italian: Hai compiuto il rituale per intero.
description.spanish: Has hecho el ritual completo.
description.schinese: 成功地完成了整个仪式。
description.tchinese: 完成整個儀式。
description.japanese: 儀式を完璧に行う
description.portuguese: Fizeste o ritual todo com sucesso.
description.polish: Odpraw rytuał.
description.danish: Udførte hele ritualet.
description.dutch: Je hebt het hele ritueel succesvol uitgevoerd.
description.norwegian: Gjennomførte hele ritualet til ende.
description.brazilian: Realizou todo o ritual, até a conclusão.
description.latam: Has hecho el ritual completo.

description.english: Ran from the sandstorm and took less than 3 hits.
description.german: Vor dem Sandsturm geflohen und weniger als 3 Treffer erlitten.
description.french: Échapper à la tempête de sable en encaissant moins de 3 coups.
description.italian: Sei sfuggita alla tempesta di sabbia e hai subito meno di 3 colpi.
description.koreana: 3회 이하로 피해를 입으며 모래폭풍에서 성공적으로 탈출하십시오.
description.spanish: Has escapado de la tormenta de arena y recibido menos de 3 golpes.
description.schinese: 从沙尘暴中逃离，且被击中少于 3 次。
description.tchinese: 從暴風沙中脫逃並被打到少於3次。
description.russian: Сбежать от песчаной бури, получив менее трех ранений.
description.japanese: ３回以上攻撃を受けずに砂嵐から逃げる
description.portuguese: Conseguiste escapar à tempestade de areia e sofreste menos de três golpes.
description.polish: Umknij przed burzą piaskową, otrzymując mniej niż 3 ciosy.
description.danish: Slap væk fra sandstormen og blev ramt mindre end tre gange.
description.dutch: Je bent ontsnapt aan de zandstorm en bent minder dan 3 keer geraakt.
description.finnish: Pakeni hiekkamyrskyä ja sai alle 3 osumaa.
description.norwegian: Unnslapp sandstormen og ble truffet av færre enn 3 slag.
description.swedish: Flydde från sandstormen utan att bli träffad mer än 2 gånger.
description.turkish: Kum fırtınasından kaçıldı ve 3'ten az darbe alındı.
description.brazilian: Fugiu da tempestade de areia e foi atingida menos de 3 vezes.
description.latam: Has escapado de la tormenta de arena y recibido menos de 3 golpes.

description.english: Didn't speak during the interrogation.
description.german: Während des Verhörs nicht gesprochen.
description.french: Ne rien dire pendant l'interrogatoire.

description.koreana: 심문 도중 아무 말도 하지 마십시오.

description.schinese: 审讯过程中没有说话。
description.tchinese: 在被拷問的過程中不發一語。
description.japanese: 尋問中に一度もしゃべらない
description.portuguese: Não falaste durante o interrogatório.
description.polish: Milcz podczas przesłuchania.
description.danish: Talte ikke under forhøret.
description.dutch: Je hebt niks gezegd tijdens de ondervraging.
description.norwegian: Snakket ikke under forhøret.
description.brazilian: Não falou durante o interrogatório.
description.latam: No has hablado durante el interrogatorio.

description.schinese: 在审讯中说了实话。
description.tchinese: 在被拷問時將實情全盤供出。
description.japanese: 尋問中に真実をすべて打ち明ける
description.portuguese: Disseste a verdade durante o interrogatório.
description.polish: Wyjaw prawdę podczas przesłuchania.
description.danish: Fortalte hele sandheden under forhøret.
description.dutch: Je hebt de waarheid verteld tijdens de ondervraging.
description.norwegian: Fortalte hele sannheten under forhøret.
description.brazilian: Disse toda a verdade durante o interrogatório.
description.latam: Has dicho toda la verdad durante el interrogatorio.

description.norwegian: En annen dimensjon har blitt oppdaget ...
description.turkish: Tek bir olası gerçeklik açığa çıkarıldı...
description.brazilian: Uma realidade possível foi descoberta...
description.latam: Se ha descubierto una posible realidad...

description.english: Took every opportunity to be evil as Aiden.
description.german: Als Aiden jede Möglichkeit zum Bösesein genutzt.
description.french: Saisir toutes les occasions de faire le mal avec Aiden.
description.italian: Non hai perso occasione di essere cattiva usando Aiden.
description.koreana: 가능한 모든 장소에서 에이든으로 악한 행동을 하십시오.
description.spanish: Has aprovechado todas las oportunidades para hacer el mal usando a Aiden.
description.schinese: 作为艾登时，抓住一切机会变得邪恶。
description.tchinese: 使用艾登時把握機會使壞。
description.russian: Не упустить ни одной возможности для злодейства в роли Айдена.
description.japanese: エイデンを使ってすべての機会で凶悪な選択をする
description.portuguese: Na pele do Aiden, aproveitaste todas as oportunidades para ser mau.
description.polish: Wykonaj wszystkie możliwe złe uczynki Aidenem.
description.danish: Benyttede alle muligheder for at være ond som Aiden.
description.dutch: Je hebt elke kans gegrepen om  slecht te zijn met Aiden.
description.finnish: Käytti kaikki tilaisuudet tehdä pahojaan Aidenina.
description.norwegian: Benyttet enhver mulighet til å være ond som Aiden.
description.swedish: Tog alla chanser att vara ond som Aiden.
description.turkish: Aiden olarak kötü olmak için her fırsat değerlendirildi.
description.brazilian: Aproveitou todas as oportunidades de ser má com Aiden.
description.latam: Has aprovechado todas las oportunidades para hacer el mal usando a Aiden.

description.english: Started at least one romance.
description.german: Mindestens eine Romanze begonnen.
description.french: Commencer au moins une relation amoureuse.
description.italian: Hai avuto almeno una storia d'amore.
description.spanish: Has comenzado al menos un romance.
description.schinese: 开始了至少一段恋情。
description.tchinese: 至少有過一段羅曼史。
description.japanese: 一度でも誰かとロマンチックな関係になる
description.portuguese: Começaste pelo menos um romance.
description.polish: Wdaj się w przynajmniej jeden romans.
description.danish: Startede mindst én romance.
description.dutch: Je bent minstens één romance begonnen.
description.norwegian: Startet minst én romanse.
description.turkish: En az bir romantik an başlatıldı.
description.brazilian: Começou pelo menos um romance.
description.latam: Has comenzado al menos un romance.

description.english: Was victorious in every battle with the evil entities.
description.german: In jedem Kampf mit den bösen Existenzen erfolgreich gewesen.
description.french: Triompher de chaque combat contre les entités maléfiques.
description.italian: Hai sempre vinto contro le entità malvagie.
description.spanish: Has vencido en todos los combates contra las entidades malignas.
description.schinese: 在每一场与邪恶灵体的战斗中都取得了胜利。
description.tchinese: 贏得對抗靈體的每場戰鬥。
description.russian: Одержать победу во всех битвах со злыми существами.
description.japanese: 失敗せずにすべての戦闘で敵の霊体を撃退する
description.portuguese: Venceste todas as batalhas contras as entidades más.
description.polish: Wygraj wszystkie potyczki ze złymi istotami.
description.danish: Vandt alle kampe med de onde væsner.
description.dutch: Je hebt elk gevecht met de slechte entiteiten gewonnen.
description.finnish: Voitti kaikki taistelut pahojen olioiden kanssa.
description.norwegian: Vant alle kampene mot de onde entitetene.
description.swedish: Gick segrande ur alla strider med de onda väsendena.
description.turkish: Kötü varlıklarla olan her savaştan galip gelindi.
description.brazilian: Saiu vitoriosa em todas as batalhas contra as entidades do mal.
description.latam: Has vencido en todos los combates contra las entidades malignas.

description.english: Let every possible character die and chose to go with them to the Infraworld.
description.german: Alle möglichen Charaktere sterben gelassen und mit ihnen in die Infrawelt gegangen.
description.french: Laisser tous les personnages mourir et choisir de les suivre dans l'Inframonde.
description.italian: Hai fatto morire tutti i personaggi possibili e hai scelto di vivere con loro nell'Inframondo.
description.koreana: 모든 인물을 죽게 내버려 두고, 그들과 함께 인프라월드로 가십시오.
description.spanish: Has dejado morir a todos los personajes posibles y has decidido ir con ellos al Inframundo.
description.schinese: 让每一个可能的角色死去，然后选择和他们一起前往异世界。
description.tchinese: 讓所有角色死亡並選擇追隨他們去異世界。
description.russian: Позволить всем героям, если возможно, умереть и отправиться с ними в Инфрамир.
description.japanese: すべてのキャラクターが死んだ状態で　インフラワールドに行くことを選ぶ
description.portuguese: Deixaste morrer todas as personagens que podiam morrer e decidiste ir com elas para o Inframundo.
description.polish: Spraw, by wszystkie postacie umarły, i udaj się z nimi do Infrawymiaru.
description.danish: Lod alle personer dø og valgte at tage med dem ind i Infraverdenen.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle mogelijke personages laten sterven en bent meegegaan naar de Infrawereld.
description.finnish: Antoi kaikkien mahdollisten hahmojen kuolla ja seurasi heitä Inframaailmaan.
description.norwegian: Lot flest mulig av figurene dø for så å gå inn i Infraworld sammen med dem.
description.swedish: Lät alla karaktärer dö och valde att gå med dem till Undervärlden.
description.turkish: Her muhtemel karakterin ölmesine izin verildi ve onlarla Dünya Ötesi'ne gitmek seçildi.
description.brazilian: Deixou todos os personagens possíveis morrerem e decidiu ir com eles para o Inframundo.
description.latam: Has dejado morir a todos los personajes posibles y has decidido ir con ellos al Inframundo.

description.english: Found all the bonuses.
description.german: Alle Boni gefunden.
description.french: Trouver tous les bonus.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i bonus.
description.spanish: Has encontrado todos los bonus.
description.schinese: 发现了所有的附加内容。
description.tchinese: 找到所有追加要素。
description.japanese: すべてのボーナスをアンロックする
description.portuguese: Encontraste todos os bónus.
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie bonusy.
description.danish: Fandt alle bonusserne.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle bonussen gevonden.
description.norwegian: Fant alle bonusene.
description.brazilian: Encontrou todos os bônus.
description.latam: Has encontrado todos los bonus.

description.english: Finished the game in Duo mode.
description.german: Das Spiel im Duo-Modus abgeschlossen.
description.french: Terminer le jeu en mode Duo.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco in modalità Cooperativa.
description.spanish: Has terminado el juego en modo Dúo.
description.schinese: 在双人模式下完成游戏。
description.tchinese: 用雙人模式完成遊戲。
description.japanese: デュオモードでゲームを終わらせる
description.portuguese: Acabaste o jogo no MODO A DOIS.
description.polish: Ukończ grę w trybie dla dwóch graczy.
description.danish: Gennemførte spillet i Duo.
description.dutch: De game in 2 speler modus voltooid.
description.norwegian: Fullførte spillet i Duomodus.
description.brazilian: Terminou o jogo no MODO EM DUPLA.
description.latam: Has terminado el juego en modo Dúo.

displayName.japanese: エンディングマスター

description.english: Saw all endings.
description.german: Jedes Ende gesehen.
description.french: Voir toutes les fins.
description.italian: Hai visto tutti i finali.
description.spanish: Has visto todos los finales.
description.schinese: 看到了所有的结局。
description.tchinese: 看過所有結局。
description.japanese: 複数回ゲームをクリアしすべてのエンディングを見る
description.portuguese: Viste todos os finais.
description.polish: Obejrzyj wszystkie zakończenia gry.
description.danish: Så alle slutninger.
description.dutch: Je hebt alle eindes gezien.
description.norwegian: Så alle avslutningene.
description.brazilian: Viu todos os finais.
description.latam: Has visto todos los finales.

description.english: Saved every character that could be saved.
description.german: Jeden Charakter gerettet, der gerettet werden konnte.
description.french: Sauver tous les personnages pouvant être sauvés.
description.italian: Hai salvato tutti i personaggi che potevano essere salvati.
description.koreana: 구할 기회가 있는 모든 인물을 구하십시오.
description.spanish: Has salvado a todos los personajes que se podían salvar.
description.schinese: 救了所有可以救的角色.
description.tchinese: 拯救有機會救到的每個角色。
description.japanese: 生き残るチャンスのあった人間をすべて助ける
description.portuguese: Salvaste todas as personagens que podiam ser salvas.
description.polish: Uratuj wszystkie postacie, które można uratować.
description.danish: Reddede alle personer, der kunne reddes.
description.dutch: Iedereen die je kon redden, heb je gered.
description.finnish: Pelasti kaikki hahmot, jotka olivat pelastettavissa.
description.norwegian: Reddet alle som kunne reddes.
description.swedish: Räddade alla karaktärer som gick att rädda.
description.turkish: Kurtarılma şansı olan tüm karakterler kurtarıldı.
description.brazilian: Salvou todos os personagens que poderiam ser salvos.
description.latam: Has salvado a todos los personajes que se podían salvar.
